titles: Mr. Baxters rules & directions for family duties shewing how every one ought to behave himself in a Christian behaviour, suitable to that relation in which God hath placed him : wherein is set forth the duty of parents (required of God) towards their children, likewise childrens duty to their parents, husbands to their wives, and wives to their husbands, masters to their servants, and servants duty to their masters ...
author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.
publisher: Printed by H. Brugis for J. Conyers ...,
notes: Extract from the "Christian Directory". Cf. BM.
